title: Ponies
creator_credit: Moreland-Latchford Productions, Joe Hayward and Hector Lemieux
brief_description: Natural sounds and music combine with the beauty of colour and motion to present the pageantry of the pony world. On hilltops, in streams, in wood and meadow, Welsh ponies are seen and heard in a kaleidoscope of mood and motion. A foal is born. A pony is schooled for the show ring.
